div.div: Chromebook Registration FormDirections for Students & Families
Please read for complete instructions on how to fill out the form to request a student Chromebook. READ MORE...

Please help us better support you and other families by answering the survey linked below. Your responses will assist us in future planning. All answers will be completely anonymous. Click "Read More" to access the survey. READ MORE...
Legal Notice for FY21 Budget, PPS Schools

Notice of Public Hearing to appear in Berkshire Eagle on Tuesday, April 14, 2020 - City of Pittsfield School Committee Notice of Public Hearing Wednesday, April 22, 5:00 pm to consider the FY21 budget READ MORE...
DELAYED 2020-2021 School Year Kindergarten & Pre-K Registration
Registration for Kindergarten and Pre-K for the 2021 School Year has been delayed. READ MORE...
2020-2021 PPS School Year Calendar Approved - Download and print here READ MORE...

Photos above feature recent scenes from our classrooms in the elementary, middle and high schools.
To see all the photo collections from the 2019-2020 year (and past years as well), from all our schoolselementary, middle and highplease visit the PPS Photo Gallery

em.style: color: rgb(69, 69, 69); font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; font-size: 12px; text-size-adjust: auto;

br.em: The Pittsfield Public Schools, in accordance with its non-discrimination and zero tolerance policy, does not discriminate in its programs, activities, facilities, employment, or educational opportunities on the basis of race, color, age, disability, sex, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, or gender identity and does not tolerate any form of discrimination, intimidation, threat, coercion and/or harassment that insults the dignity of others by interfering with their freedom to learn and work. [M.G.L. c.76, s5]

div.style: font-family: latoregular; color: white; padding-top: 8px; text-align: left;

div.span:
Due to the medical emergency, Pittsfield Public Schools are closed until Monday, May 4.
Mercer Administration Building is also closed. Please email until school reopens.
